Pre-Game Insights: The Hornets' season has been a nightmare as they sit in the 14th spot in the Eastern Conference with a record of 7-26, while the Cavaliers sit atop the Eastern Conference with a 30-4 record.
The Hornets have lost their last 17 out of 18 games.
LaMelo Ball and Brandon Miller, the Hornets' two-star players, are listed as 'questionable' for this contest and might return.
Evan Mobley has had a huge impact in the matchups versus the Hornets and surpassed a career-high 41 points in the recent game between these two teams.
The Hornets need to prevent the Cavaliers from getting uncontested looks at the rim and win the battle on the boards.
